parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake pedal can cause the vehicle to not slow down or stop, leading to accidents or near-miss situations, which can result in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brake pedal does not respond to pressure
the vehicle does not slow down or stop when the brake pedal is depressed
excessive force is required to stop the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Premature brake pad wear can lead to reduced braking performance, increasing the risk of accidents or near-miss situations.
symptoms: The brake pads wear out excessively quickly
the vehicle requires frequent brake pad replacements
the brakes feel spongy or soft
the vehicle takes longer to stop.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Locking brakes can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents or near-miss situations, which can result in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The brakes lock up
the vehicle pulls to one side
the vehicle vibrates or shakes when braking
the brakes make a loud noise when applied.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The faulty fuel gauge can cause uncertainty and anxiety for drivers, making it difficult to plan trips and potentially leading to running out of fuel, which can be dangerous.
symptoms: The fuel gauge does not move until a certain number of miles have been driven after filling up
the pump shuts off prematurely when filling up
the miles-to-empty display shows an unrealistic range
the fuel gauge remains stuck on "Full" regardless of the actual fuel level.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the radio dials to illuminate when the dimmer is used can cause distraction and discomfort for drivers, especially at night, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: The radio dials turn completely off or dark when the dimmer is used
making it difficult to operate the radio.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and hard downshifting of the transmission can cause the vehicle to slide or lose traction, potentially leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The vehicle shifts down hard with two clunks when braking
especially on slippery surfaces
causing the vehicle to slide or lose traction.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission to properly engage park can cause the vehicle to roll unexpectedly, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle rolls back or moves unexpectedly when in park
accompanied by an abnormal whining sound from the transmission
and may cause the air bag
seat belt
and service safety restraint warning lights to appear on the instrument panel.
